items.sentence: This is the most fun I\'ve had in a long time.
Tom got into the driver\'s seat and drove off.
My children have just finished their homework.
My father is two years younger than my mother.
My father used to read books to me at bedtime.
My grandmother really likes watching TV a lot.
How did Tom know Mary wouldn\'t be here today?
How did Tom know which book Mary hadn\'t read?
How did you know Tom wasn\'t going to be here?
Tom might be able to convince Mary to do that.
Tom might be able to convince Mary to help us.
Tom might not be the one who broke the window.
Tom said he wanted to learn more about Boston.
Tom said he was going to catch the 2:30 train.
Tom said he was hoping that you would do that.
Tom said he was hungry enough to eat anything.
Tom said he was too busy to help Mary do that.
Computer supplies are very expensive in Japan.
I gave Tom a couple of tickets for my concert.
I had one beer and pretended to be very drunk.
I want to become a TV announcer in the future.
Right now, there isn\'t much I can do to help.
I hear she is going to get married next month.
I hear that Tom really likes living in Boston.
I heard that Tom is going to get married soon.
Tom has already been told not to do that here.
Tom has been hired to be our basketball coach.
Tom has been living in Boston with his father.
Tom has learned a lot about Australia from me.
Tom has made some terrible decisions recently.
Tom found it difficult to answer the question.
Tom found it difficult to get along with Mary.
Tom gave Mary a quick kiss and got on the bus.
Tom gave us permission to use his beach house.
Tom got drunk and drowned while taking a bath.
Tom is tired of people telling him what to do.
Tom is too old to be doing this kind of thing.
Tom is willing to do almost anything for Mary.
Why are you protesting against the government?
Why in the world would I want to be a teacher?
Why would you ever want to do a job like that?
I wouldn\'t be here if Tom hadn\'t invited me.
He promised me that he wouldn\'t tell anybody.
Tom wasn\'t satisfied with the way I did that.
Tom wasn\'t the one who advised me to do this.
Tom wasn\'t the one who did that. It was Mary.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who thought that way.
Tom wasn\'t the only survivor of the massacre.
Does anybody want to take a walk to the beach?
Does this need to be kept in the refrigerator?
